name: TalentAttest.com
overview:
TalentAttest also focuses on bridging the gap between the academic skills of a fresh professional graduate and the IT industry’s skill expectation by honing the skills of fresh candidates through exams and expert guidance.

TalentAttest facilitates hiring managers and recruiters to evaluate candidates accurately on a wide variety of IT skills based on customized exams. TalentAttest brings the IT experience of experienced candidates to the limelight by providing a platform to showcase their skills.
